info.description: This is the API documentation for Floorplanner
info.title: Floorplanner

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results to show per page

post.description: Create a project

external_identifier.description: External identifier which must start with a character, not a number and must be unique per project

creator_email.description: Add permissions to a project for user with email. (Address must be present in our database)

enable_vr_tour.description: Automatically adds 3D tour to the project (This requires a credit transaction)

public.description: Sets the project public or private

items.description: A label you want to attach to a project

template_id.description: The ID of the template you would like to use

city.description: The city in which the project is located

country.description: The country in which the project is located

address.description: The address at which the project is located

zipcode.description: The zipcode in which the project is located

building.description: The building in which the project is located

state.description: The state in which the project is located

coords.description: The longitude and latitude at which the project is located, separated by a comma

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Search query for projects by name

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results to show per page

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Search for projects of sub-user by ID

post.description:
Import a project FML (JSON or XML)
**QUIRK**
The `x`, `y`, and `z` coordinates must be specified in meters instead of centimeters. To set any coordinate to 160cm set it to 1.6.
Import roomplan data (JSON) from Apple's Roomplan API. The body should contain a list of points with windows, walls, objects and openings.
List 25 deleted projects
Update a project

public.description: Sets the project public or private

enable_vr_tour.description: Automatically adds 3D tour to the project (This requires a credit transaction)

delete.description: This API call removes the project FML from the cloud and makes it no longer accessible

delete.description: Enable 3D tour exports (this will require a credit transaction)

contact_method.description: What method to contact the lead

identifier.description: A custom identifier for the lead

message.description: A message the lead has sent in the save form

created_at.description: Time when the lead was added

export_interior_link.description: Unused link, but will useful in the future

products.description: List of products used in the project

product_image.description: Link to a image of the product

click_url.description: Link for tracking clicks on the product

materials.description: List of materials used for the product

post.description: Add a drawing to a floor

filename.description: Uploaded file io, either in png, jpg or pdf format

remote_filename_url.description: Remote url location of an image, opposite of filename file io

placement_width.description: Size of the drawing in the editor

placement_height.description: Size of the drawing in the editor

alpha.description: Transparency of the drawing in the editor in percentage

position.description: Position offset of the drawing in the editor. Only first two values are used, X and Y

rotation.description: Rotation of the drawing in the editor

visible.description: A true or false value for displaying the drawing

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Search query for projects by name

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Search for exports of project by ID

post.description: Export a project to 2D / 3D images or Virtual staging. There are lot of options but most of them are not required

designs.description: A design id inside an array

type.description: Type of export, baked is virtual staging and mesh is a 3D object in GLB format

combine.description: A boolean value to choose between merging the export on one page or exporting multiple pages

stamp_names.description: A boolean value to show or hide the name of the floor on the export.

orientation.description: Either landscape or portrait, orientation of the export

size.description: One of A4, A3, A2, A1, A0, LETTER, LEGAL - overrides width and height when used with fmt of pdf

scale.description: Use a fixed scale, either 50, 100, 200 or 500, the value represents a scale of 1:[N] where [N] is the supplied integer. Only available for fmt of pdf, default auto (auto fit)

fit.description: By default all the designs of a project will have the same scale. If you want to scale all the design to fit the paper set this param to true

background_image.description: Specify the URL of a background image

url.description: Specify the URL of a custom north arrow image

size.description: Specify the size of the compass, default 15

corner.description: Specify the corner of the compass. Bottom positions: BL, BC, BR. Top positions: TL, TC, TR

url.description: Specify the URL of a custom logo

position.description: Specify the position of the logo. Bottom positions: BL, BC, BR. Top positions: TL, TC, TR

scale.description: Specify the scale of the logo. Quirck: the value 1 is used for auto scaling, please use 0.99 instead

url.description: Specify the URL of a custom logo

position.description: Specify the position of the logo. Bottom positions: BL, BC, BR. Top positions: TL, TC, TR

scale.description: Specify the scale of the logo. Quirck: the value 1 is used for auto scaling, please use 0.99 instead

width.description: Width of the scalebar in px

height.description: Height of the scalebar in px

div.description: Divisions in the scalebar in px

showDims.description: Showing or hiding dimensions on the rendering, true or false

showLabels.description: Showing or hiding labels on the rendering, true or false

showLights.description: Showing or hiding lights on the rendering, true or false

showSymbols.description: Showing or hiding symbols on the rendering, true or false

showDropShadows.description: Showing or hiding drop shadows on the rendering, true or false

showFixtures.description: Showing or hiding fixtures on the rendering, true or false

showObjects.description: Showing or hiding furniture on the rendering, true or false

showObjectColour.description: Showing furniture in colour or in black & white on the rendering, true or false

showStructuralColour.description: Showing structural items (like staircases) in colour or in black & white on the rendering, true or false

showSurfaceAreaSize.description: Toggles showing area sizes for all the areas in a design, true of false

visuals.description: Showing the whole rendering in black & white, fully coloured or a combination

type.description: One of 'Photo', 'Panorama' or 'Stereo' (for left and right use 'panorama')

floors_explode_distance.description: Distance between floors below for 'show floors below'

section.description: The height of the wall until cut-off

callback.description: Specify a http endpoint or valid email address

include_overlay_info.description: Return overlay information in the response, this includes camera poses with world to screen and export rectangles

post.description: Creates a panorama based based a specific camera and specific design

designs.description: A design id inside an array

type.description: One of 'Panorama' or 'Stereo', (for left and right use 'panorama')

callback.description: Specify a http endpoint or valid email address

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Set the amount of results to show per page as an integer, defaults to 50. Everything higher than 50 will be ingored and the default will be used instead

corner.description: position of the north arrow, bottom-Left, bottom-right, top-left and top-right

wallOuterThickness.description: Default wall thickness outside a room

wallTopColor2D.description: Color of the wall on top in 2d

wallTopColor3D.description: Color of the wall on top in 3d

blueprintBGColor.description: Color of the wall on in blueprint mode

url.description: Remote URL to a logo for 3d tours

hideItemsAboveHeight.description: Hide items above a certain height
